Class FileIO

java.lang.Object
com.example.ss7g7.stars.FileIO
public class FileIO
extends java.lang.Object
The FileIO class handles all serialization operations to *.ser files

    • updateStudentRecords

      public java.util.ArrayList<Student> updateStudentRecords​(Student currentStudent, java.lang.String mode)
      This method deletes or updates student records according to the parameter mode.
      Parameters:
      currentStudent - refers to the Student object to be removed/updated
      mode - can either be "remove" or "update"
